title: [Large-Scale] Online Education Based on Four-Component Instructional Design for Strengthening Medical Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Healthcare Management Knowledge and Leadership Experience
context.additional_context: Work-integrated educational design for healthcare service managers, emphasizing bridging the gap between theory and practice

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world problems in medical settings with 80% accuracy by applying four-component instructional design
Learners improve leadership competencies by 70% or more during team-based project execution
Learners implement at least one new process in their workplace within three months of completing the training
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
